description: Creates a system instance. This action validates the system instance, prepares the deployment-related resources. For Greengrass deployments, it updates the Greengrass group that is specified by the greengrassGroupName parameter. It also adds a file to the S3 bucket specified by the s3BucketName parameter. You need to call DeploySystemInstance after running this action. For Greengrass deployments, since this action modifies and adds resources to a Greengrass group and an S3 bucket on the caller's behalf, the calling identity must have write permissions to both the specified Greengrass group and S3 bucket. Otherwise, the call will fail with an authorization error. For cloud deployments, this action requires a flowActionsRoleArn value. This is an IAM role that has permissions to access AWS services, such as AWS Lambda and AWS IoT, that the flow uses when it executes. If the definition document doesn't specify a version of the user's namespace, the latest version will be used by default.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata, consisting of key-value pairs, that can be used to categorize your system instances. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an AWS IoT Things Graph resource consisting of a key-value pair. The required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length. The optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

parameters.name: definition
parameters.description: A document that defines an entity. The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value. The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

nested_params.name: language
nested_params.description: The language used to define the entity. GRAPHQL is the only valid value.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The GraphQL text that defines the entity.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target type of the deployment. Valid values are GREENGRASS and CLOUD.

parameters.name: metricsConfiguration
parameters.description: An object that specifies whether cloud metrics are collected in a deployment and, if so, what role is used to collect metrics. cloudMetricEnabled (boolean) --- A Boolean that specifies whether cloud metrics are collected. metricRuleRoleArn (string) --- The ARN of the role that is used to collect cloud metrics.

nested_params.name: cloudMetricEnabled
nested_params.description: A Boolean that specifies whether cloud metrics are collected.

nested_params.name: metricRuleRoleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the role that is used to collect cloud metrics.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the system instance.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the system instance.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the system instance.

nested_items.name: target
nested_items.description: The target of the system instance.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupName
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the system instance was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the system instance was last updated.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.

nested_items.name: greengrassGroupVersionId
nested_items.description: The version of the Greengrass group where the system instance is deployed.
